product.name: Currents
product.description: Currents is a Tame Impala album about personal transition and growing older, exploring themes of change, heartbreak, and self-examination after a breakup.

product.name: Deadbeat
product.description: Deadbeat is Tame Impala's 2025 album, which sees Kevin Parker leaning into dance music, inspired by the Australian "bush doof" rave scene.

product.name: AM
product.description: AM is the 2013 fifth studio album by Arctic Monkeys, noted for its departure from their earlier work with a more groovy, R and B-influenced, and darker sound.

product.name: To Pimp a Butterfly
product.description: To Pimp a Butterfly is a 2015 hip-hop album by Kendrick Lamar that is a fusion of jazz, funk, and soul music, and is critically acclaimed for its complex exploration of themes like racism, identity, depression, and success.

product.name: Konnichiwa
product.description: Konnichiwa is the fourth studio album by British rapper Skepta, released in 2016

product.name: Only By The Night
product.description: Only by the Night is the fourth studio album by Kings of Leon, released in September 2008.

product.name: The New Abnormal
product.description: "The New Abnormal" is a music album by The Strokes that is both a return to their classic sound and an evolution, blending indie rock with new wave, pop, and electronic elements

product.name: Nevermind
product.description: Nevermind is the 1991 second studio album by the American rock band Nirvana, which became a commercial and critical success that launched the band to global fame.

product.name: Hozier
product.description: Hozier is the self-titled debut album by Irish musician Hozier, released in 2014.

product.name: Tranquility Base Hotel and Casino
product.description: Tranquility Base Hotel and Casino is a concept album by the Arctic Monkeys that is set in a fictional luxury resort on the Moon.
